name: CAS 117 3D Platformer
description: This is my CAS 117 3D Platformer Project. In this project, I had changed the platforms to look like mushrooms instead by changing the shape of the floor tiles. I did this for two of the platforms. I also changed the aesthetics of the goal pick up to a star. If you look at the screen shots it is in star format rather than a crystal format. For my last modification, I changed one of the walking enemies to look like a floating skull instead. This skull is smaller but also floats without needing to walk on its feet.
